radiographic_examinations.findings: 15-mm endobronchial mass obstructing roughly 80% of the left main bronchial lumen.
No evidences of recurrence of renal clear cell carcinoma or metastasis of the left main bronchial tumor.
No evidences of recurrence of renal clear cell carcinoma or metastasis of the left main bronchial tumor.
Left anastomotic stoma unobstructed, and no pulmonary atelectasis was observed.
